name: Ephemeral (xpanderex)
description:
This was a project made for one of my 2nd year university assignments. Further development may be implemented, but for now it's just a Demo. The controls are explained in game, and the save is done locally on your machine. Everything was done by me, from coding to art, with the exception being the menu music, made by Gre_YT for another project that I manage(development on hold).

How to download and install:

  1. Downlaod the Ephemeral.rar archive below by pressind the Download button
  2. Extract the files
  3. Launch the Ephemeral.exe icon
  4. Enjoy :)
